import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Bin from "../../multimedia/png/bin.png" import { deleteData } from "../../Services/CRUD" const TicketCard = ({data}) => { const handleDelete = async (id) => { await deleteData("tickets", id) } return (

${data.amount}

{data.concept}

{data.date}

) } export default TicketCard
